articles.title: Prepare now for Putin to cut off gas supply, Europe warned - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Europe has been urged to prepare for a complete cutting off of Russian gas supplies as the continent’s energy crisis deepens.

articles.title: Ukraine expects EU-wide support for candidacy to join bloc - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — A Ukrainian official overseeing the country’s push to join the European Union said Wednesday that she’s “100%” certain all 27 EU nations will approve Ukraine's EU candidacy during a summit this week.

articles.title: European Tour returns to Singapore in 2023, first time in 9 years - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The DP World Tour will return to Singapore in 2023 for the first time in nine years, as the golf organisation beefs up its Asian footprint, it said on Tuesday (Jun 21).
